title: Amsted Industries, an Employee Owned Company
itunes:title: Amsted Industries, an Employee Owned Company
description: Stephen R. Smith, Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Amsted Industries Incorporated shares the benefits of  Employee Stock Ownership Plans (ESOPs) and also how Amsted has navigated Covid and supply chain issues. Interview date: March 2, 2022
